resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.
Espresso with added hot water (100-150 ml). Served in a cappuccino cup.
Mild /milk coffee/ with steamed milk and foam. Served in latte glass or coffee cup.
Espresso with steamed milk and deep layer of foam. Often topped with cocoa powder.
Espresso with chocolate syrup and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream.
